name: PatchNotes
short: A cog that posts patch notes of software (namely streamlabs, twitch, and OBS) to a discord channel
description: A cog that posts patch notes of software (namely streamlabs, twitch, and OBS) to a discord channel
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing PatchNotes!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
